org.youscope.plugin.livestream

Class ContinousMeasurementPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • org.youscope.plugin.livestream.ContinousMeasurementPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class ContinousMeasurementPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    A panel showing the images of a continuous measurement.
    Author:
    Moritz Lang
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • ContinousMeasurementPanel

        public ContinousMeasurementPanel(YouScopeClient client,
                                 YouScopeServer server,
                                 java.lang.String camera,
                                 int imagingPeriod,
                                 java.lang.String configGroup,
                                 java.lang.String channel,
                                 double exposure,
                                 boolean increaseContrast)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        client - Interface to the client.
        server - Interface to the server.
        camera - The ID of the camera with which it should be imaged, or null to use the default camera.
        imagingPeriod - The period between two images.
        configGroup - The config group in which the channel is defined.
        channel - The channel which should be imaged.
        exposure - The exposure time for the imaging.
        increaseContrast - True if the contrast of the image should be automatically increased.

    • Method Detail

      • setIncreaseContrast

        public void setIncreaseContrast(boolean increaseContrast)
        Sets if the contrast should be automatically increased.
        Parameters:
        increaseContrast - True if the contrast should be increased.

      • setCamera

        public void setCamera(java.lang.String camera)
        Sets the camera with which it should be imaged. Set to null or empty string to image with default camera.
        Parameters:
        camera - Camera with which it should be imaged.

      • setChannel

        public void setChannel(java.lang.String configGroup,
                       java.lang.String channel)
        Sets the channel in which it is imaged.
        Parameters:
        configGroup - The config group in which the channel is defined.
        channel - The channel to image.

      • setExposure

        public void setExposure(double exposure)
        Sets the exposure time for the continuous imaging.
        Parameters:
        exposure - The exposure time.

      • setImagingPeriod

        public void setImagingPeriod(int imagingPeriod)
        Sets the period length between two successive images.
        Parameters:
        imagingPeriod - The period time.

      • isMeasurementRunning

        public boolean isMeasurementRunning()
        Returns if measurement is currently running or not.
        Returns:
        TRUE if measurement is running, false otherwise.

      • stopMeasurement

        public void stopMeasurement()
        Stops the measurement. Does nothing if measurement is not running. The call immediately returns, even if the stopping of the measurement takes longer.

      • stopMeasurementAndWait

        public void stopMeasurementAndWait()
        Stops the measurement and waits until it is finished.

      • startMeasurement

        public void startMeasurement()
        Starts the continuous measurement.

      • newImage

        public void newImage(ImageEvent<?> event)
        Displays the new image.
        Parameters:
        event - image to be displayed

        Sets the lower and the upper cutoff, if the contrast is increased.

        upperCutoff - The upper cutoff.
